ComicInfo.Title: Battle With Boneyard; Anatomy of a Hero: Part 2; Market Realities: Part One
ComicInfo.Summary:
Boneyard seeks out the Strangers because his realm is accosted by demons that he believes the Strangers have freed. The Strangers realize he is discussing Bastinado and his demon legion and are about to agree with him when Mantra arrives, warning the Strangers that Boneyard is an evil person. Boneyard then takes the opportunity to kidnap Atom Bob because of his incredible power and disappears through a breach. Mantra and the Strangers team up to chase after Boneyard and battle his wives and his soldiers, including Notch. When the Strangers and Mantra defeat them, Boneyard uses the power he has stolen from Atom Bob and opens a breach for Bastinado and his demons to leave them on Earth instead of his own realm.
This story continues in Mantra #12
